name: Tricky Keys 2
description:
Replay and reestablish your connection to the world of Tricky Keys in this old-school puzzle platforming adventure!

Equip your AI assistant with the right combination of instructions and collaborate to solve each level, avoiding the hazards along the way.

Features:
  • 20+ levels with helpful tutorial sections,
  • A variety of instructions with which to configure the AI assistant,
  • Charming visual design with quality pixel art graphics,
  • An original soundtrack,
  • Point from Tricky Keys.
Controls:
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move the player and navigate UI,
  • Z or Space to jump,
  • Enter to start/stop the AI - stopping will reset the stage, while keeping your progress in the AI's instructions window.
  • Esc to pause the game.
Credits:
  • sarn - Programming and sound effects
  • THX - Art
  • valentines - Art
  • Snakeblock - Art and level design
  • Shrombus - Level design
  • Oroshibu - Music

Made in 3 days for Wowie Jam 4.0 with the theme "Collaborate With AI".
